thread.title: Hartman and Perry students participate in Career Day
thread.title_full: Hartman and Perry students participate in Career Day

author: epoole@ellwoodcityledger.com(Eric Poole)
title: Hartman and Perry students participate in Career Day
text:
Hartman and Perry students participate in Career Day 0 comments 
ELLWOOD CITY -- Students at Perry Lower Intermediate and Hartman Intermediate got a chance to learn about people from numerous professions Friday during a Career Day program at the schools. 
Presenters participated in the morning at Hartman and in the afternoon at Perry, with about 30 people talking with students in grades three through six at the two schools. Among those taking part were business owners Rochelle Spagnolo of Konsignment Konnections, Danielle Woodhead of Triangle Kitchen Outlet, Rachel McGreal of Al's Corner and Dawna Poole of Get "Back" to Me. 
Other occupations represented included auto mechanics instructor, sales, military, pest control, journalist, dance instructor, software engineers, nutritional science, geology, emergency medical technician, mechanical engineering, cosmetology, and food service nursing. 
The event was organized by elementary counselor Ashley Gigliotti. The Dr. Rita Hazen Education Foundation provided lunch for the participants.
